ygData.subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, comparing it to the other songs, this is what I think. Healing:1 is equivalent to the Hymn, so it s a replacement for our all-purpose Hymn (Notice that
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, comparing it to the other songs, this is what I think.
"Healing:1" is equivalent to the Hymn, so it's a replacement for our
all-purpose Hymn (Notice that the Hymn goes up as you go up in level..)
"Strength:10" is double what the Anthem de Arms provides. Anyone know if
that one goes up as you age?
MaxHP is obviously an HP bonus - one could assume (based on the level) that
it is also affected by the "age-progression factor"
So, finally, Protective Skin - which I think is a "Rune-like" effect, will
in fact, absorb about half of the HP that your HP buff gives you.
Until we get a test, however, this is all up for grabs.

Talies the Researcher

At 03:57 PM 12/7/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>I thought any hit that exceeded a damage shield's remaining hit absorbtion
>was suffered in full? If this is a 10pt damage shield will it ever help?
>
> Kit
